Source.Name: system-tools-backends
Source.Summary: The System Tools Backends (s-t-b for short) are a set of cross-platform modules for Linux, FreeBSD and other Unix systems.
Source.Description: The System Tools Backends (s-t-b for short) are a set of cross-platform modules for Linux, FreeBSD and other Unix systems. The backends provide an common DBus interface to all platforms to modify or read the system configuration in a distro independent fashion.
